summary: Replaces the amount of blood from the melee attacks common with the amount of blood from the melee attacks of the Werewolves.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ffff00][/color][/center][center][size=3][color=#ffff00]What does this mod do?

[/color]It is noticed that werewolves can shed more blood with their normal attacks than any other race available to play. This mod will replace the amount of blood coming from the melee attacks of the playable races with the same amount that is seen in a Werewolf attack.
The small amount of blood that was common in these playable races can still be seen during an unarmed fight.
[color=#ffff00]
[/color][color=#ffff00]Compatibility
[/color]
With any other mod and DLC, since it does not contain ESP.


[/size][/center]
author: Fillipe
